Posted By: Gcrudaplaneswalker (1/24/2013 10:36:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Amazing value for one mana. It'll really keep your opponents on their toes, too, as they would see the small amount of mana you have left and think that you couldn't *possibly* cast anything powerful. Just when they determine that it's safe to attack... BOOM, game won!   
  
OK, there's a *bit* more involved in winning a game, but that doesn't stop it from being an awesome card.
posts.html:

Posted By: GearLeader (1/26/2013 10:09:15 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This can be declared before combat damage is assigned, so you don't even have to lose a chump blocker. The downside to this is that removal is commonly used on an evasive creature that otherwise couldn't be stopped. This won't be able to stop a flyer/intimidator/etc. effectively.
posts.html:
